immediate_actions.name: Enable SYN Cookies
immediate_actions.description: Enable kernel SYN cookies to prevent SYN flood

immediate_actions.name: Limit SYN Packets
immediate_actions.description: Limit SYN packets to prevent SYN flood

alternative_actions.name: Block Invalid TCP Flags
alternative_actions.description: Drop packets with invalid TCP flag combinations
commands: iptables -A INPUT -p tcp --tcp-flags ALL NONE -j DROP
iptables -A INPUT -p tcp --tcp-flags ALL ALL -j DROP
iptables -A INPUT -p tcp --tcp-flags SYN,RST SYN,RST -j DROP

alternative_actions.name: ICMP Rate Limiting
alternative_actions.description: Limit ICMP packets to prevent ICMP flood

mitigations.human_explanation:
A Protocol Exploit attack has been detected with CRITICAL severity.

Why: Classified as Protocol Exploit due to: unusual protocol behavior (SHAP: 4.08)

Recommended immediate actions:
  1. Enable SYN Cookies: Enable kernel SYN cookies to prevent SYN flood
  2. Limit SYN Packets: Limit SYN packets to prevent SYN flood

[CRITICAL] Immediate action required. Auto-blocking recommended. Escalate to SOC immediately.
